title: kandA bEDavo
sahitya:
kandA bEDavo maNNu tinna bEDavo


anupallavi

  kanda bEDavo maNNu tinnali bEDavo sundarAngana ninage hoTTe tOyuvudayya


caraNam 1    bEgane Elayya maNNATa biDo nInu jOgi barutAnalli anjisuvudakIga
    caraNam 2    tAyi mAtanu otti karadali maNNotti bAyali iTTanu bAlakrSNayyanu
    caraNam 3    peTTu koDuve ninage siTTu bahaLa ide muTTa bEDo maNNu beNNe taruvenayya
    caraNam 4    ammayya kELele bAyali maNNIlla gummanu bara bEDa summane irutEne
    caraNam 5    maguve bA bA endu baNNisi karedaLu maguvina bAya shOdhisidaLu bEgane
    caraNam 6    bAyali kaNDaLu hadinAlgu lOkava kAya maretaLayya maruLige vashavAgi
    caraNam 7    mattu kaNDaLu avaLu gOkulavellava atta kaNDaLu tanna krSNana bagalali
    caraNam 8    gOpyara maneyali gOpAlakrSNanu gOpyEra maneyante duDuku mADutalirda
    caraNam 9    bAlanu bhItiya maNNetti uNutirda bAle gOpyammanu maNNa tegedirdaLu
  caraNam 10    kandanu nInalla kandarpa janakane kandane ninna bAya muccikoLLayya Iga
  caraNam 11    dEvAdi dEvane dEvaki tanayane bhAva janayyane bArayya doreye
 1 caraNam 2    jayagaLAgali namma krSNarAyage bahuLa jayagaLAgaLi avana bhaktara vrndake
 1 caraNam 3    lIlA vinOdanu rukmiNi lOlanu lIle tOridanandu tande purandara viTTala
